title: Volunteers stage 'biggest microplastic beach survey ever'
text:
Volunteers stage 'biggest microplastic beach survey ever' 12:56pm GMT - 01:49 
Volunteers in the south of England trying to gauge the scale of the problem of plastic pollution in the oceans have carried out what they called the 'biggest microplastic beach survey in the world ever.' Stuart McDill reports.
